- Filipe Luis has been playing well for Brazil in recent friendly matches.

Filipe Luis is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a defender for English club Chelsea and the Brazilian national team. In the recent international break, he represented Brazil during their friendly matches against France and Chile.

A central idea of the given aspect is that Chelsea manager Jose Mourinho wants his team to focus on the title run-in, which means he wants the team to be fully committed and dedicate themselves towards winning the championship.

The aspect states that Chelsea has nine difficult games left to win the league. This implies that the team is currently in a position of strength, having already won the Premier League title. However, the remaining games are expected to be challenging as they have to maintain their winning streak in order to secure the championship. The games will require determination and focus on the part of the players and the team as a whole.
